# documentData

**Instance Property**

The CDA document stored as XML data.

## Declaration

```swift
var documentData: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

The CDA document’s XML format is specified by the [http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=7] standard. .

When using an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentQuery] object to retrieve documents from the HealthKit store, if the query’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentQuery/includeDocumentData] property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the retrieved documents will have `nil`-valued `documentData` properties.

## Accessing the Document’s Data

- **authorName**: The document’s author.
- **custodianName**: The name of the organization responsible for the document.
- **patientName**: The patient’s name.
- **title**: The document’s title.

items.description: The name of the organization responsible for the document.

title: documentData
